skills.headline: My skills

projectDiscription.0: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projectDiscription.1: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
projectDiscription.2: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
